Identify each model in play on the project and define its [[bounded context]]. This includes the implicit models of non-object-oriented subsystems. Name each [[bounded context]], and make the names part of the [[ubiquitous language]].

story.text: The [[Outlandish Academy]] is a P2P framework for creating online and offline learning experiences.

We have started a group that meets [[Every Wednesday]], where we have decided to research the following subjects or perhaps we should call them projects:

- [[Teaching Space]]s for [[Future Law]]
- [[Experience API]]
- [[Outlandish Methodology]]
- [[Writing with Strangers]]

# Core Proposal

- [[Academy Methodology]]
- [[Learning Roles]]
- [[Learning Passport]]
- [[Agile Teaching]]
- [[Nomadic Teaching]]
- [[Sustainable Learning Model]]

# Activity
  
- [[Tools]] and [[Activity]]
- [[Changes to this Site]]
- [[Drop in]] to our Fedwiki chat - [https://riot.im/app/#/room/#fedwiki:matrix.org riot.im]
